00034 /*
00035  * \file
00036  *      This is a sample main file with desktop.
00037  * \author
00038  *      Takahide Matsutsuka <markn@markn.org>
00039  */
00040 
00041 #include "contiki.h"
00042 
00043 #include "program-handler.h"
00044 #include "about-dsc.h"
00045 #include "calc-dsc.h"
00046 #include "process-list-dsc.h"
00047 #include "shell-dsc.h"
00048 #include "mt-test-dsc.h"
00049 
00050 #if WITH_LOADER_ARCH
00051 #include "directory-dsc.h"
00052 #endif
00053 
00054 /*---------------------------------------------------------------------------*/
00055 int
00056 main(void)
00057 {
00058   /* initialize process manager. */
00059   process_init();
00060 
00061   /* start services */
00062   process_start(&ctk_process, NULL);
00063   process_start(&program_handler_process, NULL);
00064   process_start(&etimer_process, NULL);
00065 
00066   /* register programs to the program handler */
00067 #if WITH_LOADER_ARCH
00068   program_handler_add(&directory_dsc, "Directory", 1);
00069   program_handler_add(&processes_dsc, "Processes", 1);
00070   //  program_handler_add(&shell_dsc, "Command shell", 1);
00071 #else
00072   program_handler_add(&processes_dsc, "Processes", 1);
00073   program_handler_add(&mttest_dsc, "Multithread", 1);
00074   program_handler_add(&calc_dsc, "Calculator", 1);
00075   program_handler_add(&about_dsc, "About", 1);
00076 //  program_handler_add(&shell_dsc, "Command shell", 1);
00077 #endif
00078 
00079   while(1) {
00080     process_run();
00081     etimer_request_poll();
00082   }
00083 }
